name: Growball
description:
A game literally about a snowball!
Jump over obstacles such as trees and rocks to increase your score. The longer you survive, the higher your score! 

How to play:
Simply tap space to jump once, double tap to double jump and triple tap to body slam. You can body slam log cabins for powerups!

Please visit us at https://www.shiftstudios.org/ for more.
Official website https://www.shiftstudios.org/growball
Contact https://www.shiftstudios.org/connect
